verses.verse: <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> that you <S%H2416>live<s%> on the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

You shall utterly <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4725>places,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> on the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and on the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree:<s%>

And you shall <S%H5422>overthrow<s%> their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H7665>break<s%> their <S%H4676>pillars,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H842>groves<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> and you shall <S%H1438>hew<s%> <S%H1438>down<s%> the <S%H6456>graven<s%> images of their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of them out of that <S%H4725>place.<s%>
You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

But to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7626>tribes<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> even to his <S%H7933>habitation<s%> shall you <S%H1875>seek,<s%> and <S%H8033>thither<s%> you shall <S%H935>come:<s%>

And <S%H8033>thither<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, and your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and your <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> and <S%H8641>heave<s%> offerings of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and your <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offerings, and the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1241>herds<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flocks:<s%>

And <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H4916>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to, you and your <S%H1004>households,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you.

You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> after <S%H3605>all<s%> the things that we <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

For you are not as <S%H5704>yet<s%> <S%H6258><s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4496>rest<s%> and to the <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you.

But when you <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives you to <S%H5157>inherit,<s%> and when he gives you <S%H5117>rest<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, so that you <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety;<s%>

Then there shall be a <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> shall you <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you; your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, and your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> your <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> and the <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H5088>vows<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5087>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> you, and your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and your <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and your <S%H519>maidservants,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is within your <S%H8179>gates;<s%> for as <S%H3588>much<s%> as he has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with you.
Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourself that you <S%H5927>offer<s%> not your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> that you <S%H7200>see:<s%>

But in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, and <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you.

<S%H7535>Notwithstanding<s%> you may <S%H2076>kill<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>lusts<s%> after, according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H5414>given<s%> you: the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof, as of the <S%H6643>roebuck,<s%> and as of the <S%H354>hart.<s%>
<S%H7535>Only<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood;<s%> you shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> it on the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>

You <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> within your <S%H8179>gates<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H1715>corn,<s%> or of your <S%H8492>wine,<s%> or of your <S%H3323>oil,<s%> or the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of your <S%H1241>herds<s%> or of your <S%H6629>flock,<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> of your <S%H5088>vows<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5087>vow,<s%> nor your <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offerings, or <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand:<s%>

But you must <S%H398>eat<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> you, and your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and your <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> and your <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> that is within your <S%H8179>gates:<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H4916>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hands<s%> to.
Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourself that you <S%H5800>forsake<s%> not the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> as <S%H3117>long<s%> as you <S%H3117>live<s%> on the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> your <S%H1366>border,<s%> as he has <S%H1696>promised<s%> you, and you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> I will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>longs<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>lusts<s%> after.

<S%H3588>If<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> be <S%H7368>too<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from you, then you shall <S%H2076>kill<s%> of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flock,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you, as I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> in your <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>lusts<s%> after.

<S%H389>Even<s%> as the <S%H6643>roebuck<s%> and the <S%H354>hart<s%> is <S%H398>eaten,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them: the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of them <S%H3162>alike.<s%>

<S%H7535>Only<s%> be <S%H2388>sure<s%> that you <S%H398>eat<s%> not the <S%H1818>blood:<s%> for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is the <S%H5315>life;<s%> and you may not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> with the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> it; you shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> it on the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>

You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> it; that it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with you, and with your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, <S%H3588>when<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H7535>Only<s%> your <S%H6944>holy<s%> things <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H1961>have,<s%> and your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> you shall <S%H5375>take,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be <S%H8210>poured<s%> out on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

<S%H8104>Observe<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, that it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with you, and with your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you, <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> them, and you <S%H3423>succeed<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H776>land;<s%>

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourself that you be not <S%H5367>snared<s%> by <S%H310>following<s%> them, <S%H310>after<s%> that they be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and that you <S%H1875>inquire<s%> not after their <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> did <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> their <S%H430>gods?<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>likewise.<s%>

You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> for <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H8130>hates,<s%> have they <S%H6213>done<s%> to their <S%H430>gods;<s%> for <S%H1571>even<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> they have <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> to their <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H853>What<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>soever<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it: you shall not <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H5921>thereto,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1639>diminish<s%> from it.
